item.title: Trick or tips 004 {R}
item.description: Trick or Tips? Ever tumbled on a code chunk that made you say: "I should have known this ¶ø?!@~&* piece of code long ago!?" Chances are you have, frustratingly, just like we have, and on multiple occasions too. In comes Trick or Tips! Trick or Tips is a series of blog posts that each present 5 -- hopefully helpful -- coding tips for a specific programming language. Posts should be short (i.
